articles.description: Mark Frerichs, a US navy veteran working as an engineer, was taken in Afghanistan in 2020.
articles.content:
By Simon Fraser and Bernd Debusmann Jr.BBC News
The Taliban have released a US engineer they had held hostage since 2020 in exchange for an Afghan tribal leader held in US custody since 2005.

articles.title: Sherri Papini: US woman who staged her own disappearance sentenced to 18 months
articles.description: Sherri Papini went missing in 2016. She pleaded guilty to staging her kidnapping earlier this year.
articles.content:
A California woman who faked her own high-profile kidnapping has been sentenced to 18 months in prison for making false statements to the FBI.
